summary: This is an email chain from December 6, 2019, providing detailed aircraft information related to Ghislaine Maxwell. It lists helicopters and private jets she piloted or traveled on, several of which are associated with Jeffrey Epstein, and requests assistance in obtaining passenger manifests for investigative purposes.

persons.name: Ghislaine Noelle Maxwell
persons.context: The email provides her pilot certificate details and lists aircraft she piloted (helicopters) or was a passenger on (jets), noting her frequent travel with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as someone Maxwell traveled with frequently; several listed aircraft are associated with him.

connections.description: The document states that Maxwell traveled with Epstein frequently, and several aircraft are associated with him.

events.title: Maxwell's Pilot Certificate Issued
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's private pilot certificate was issued.

events.title: Helicopter Certificate Issued
events.description: A certificate for a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter (likely serial 760750) was issued.

events.title: Aircraft Information Request
events.description: An email was sent requesting aircraft information and passenger manifests for Maxwell's associated aircraft, noting the high-profile nature of the case.

locations: 103 Folk Rd St 202 Wilmington, DE 19803 (Prior registration address for Freedom Air International Inc)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell held a private pilot certificate issued in 2007 and personally piloted helicopters.
Multiple aircraft are listed with tail numbers and details, including helicopters nicknamed 'Air Ghislaine 1' and 'Air Ghislaine 2' and several private jets.
The document explicitly links Maxwell's travel to Jeffrey Epstein, stating she traveled with him frequently and that some aircraft are associated with him.
The correspondence is part of a high-profile investigation, with a request for passenger manifests for the listed aircraft.
Aircraft details include registration histories, serial numbers, and certificate issue dates spanning from 2001 to 2019.
